title: Beth Gibbons Plays Portishead’s “Glorybox” at Coachella 2025
description: The Portishead front woman played the fan-favorite track before closing out with her solo song “Reaching Out.” Beth Gibbons Plays Portishead’s “Glorybox” at Coachella 2025 Jaeden Pinder
author: Jaeden Pinder
excerpt: Portishead’s Beth Gibbons performed her band’s song “Glory Box” at Coachella 2025. She also played tracks from her debut solo album Lives Outgrown.
text: Beth Gibbons, the Portishead vocalist and trip-hop pioneer, performed her Bristol band’s hit “Glory Box” at Coachella 2025 Saturday night. Watch the clip below. Gibbons performed 10 songs at the Gobi Tent, most of them being from her debut solo album Lives Outgrown. Before closing her set with “Reaching Out,” Gibbons sang “Glory Box” in a wash of sapphire and turquoise lights, not unlike the album cover of the band’s genre-defining record Dummy. Get Beth Gibbons Tickets Here Lives Outgrown was released in May 2024 via Domino. It was nominated for the Mercury Prize, alongside Charli XCX, Nia Archives, Corinne Bailey Rae, and that year’s winners in English Teacher. Portishead remain active mostly a handful of live shows over the years, and their most recent record Third, was released in 2008. Gibbons has been touring across North America since March. After Coachella, Gibbons will perform a handful of dates across the US, Australia, the UK, and Europe through mid-July, including slots at Glastonbury, Down the Rabbit Hole, Way Out West, and more. Find tickets here. Check out Beth Gibbons’s Coachella setlist below, and head here for more coverage of Coachella 2025. To livestream the final day of Coachella weekend one, head to their YouTube or use the Coachella app. Setlist: Tell Me Who You Are Today Burden of Life Floating on a Moment Rewind For Sale Lost Changes Tom the Model (Beth Gibbons & Rustin Man cover) Beyond the Sun Glory Box (Portishead song) Reaching OutBeth Gibbons y “Glory Box” de Portishead, en vivo en una versión increíble en Coachella 2025. Lo vi y merecía ser compartido. pic.twitter.com/d9Wp17d0i5— Patricio Pérez (@YoPatoPerez) April 13, 2025
html:
Beth Gibbons, the Portishead vocalist and trip-hop pioneer, performed her Bristol band’s hit “Glory Box” at Coachella 2025 Saturday night. Watch the clip below.

Gibbons performed 10 songs at the Gobi Tent, most of them being from her debut solo album Lives Outgrown. Before closing her set with “Reaching Out,” Gibbons sang “Glory Box” in a wash of sapphire and turquoise lights, not unlike the album cover of the band’s genre-defining record Dummy.

Get Beth Gibbons Tickets Here

Lives Outgrown was released in May 2024 via Domino. It was nominated for the Mercury Prize, alongside Charli XCX, Nia Archives, Corinne Bailey Rae, and that year’s winners in English Teacher. Portishead remain active mostly a handful of live shows over the years, and their most recent record Third, was released in 2008.

Gibbons has been touring across North America since March. After Coachella, Gibbons will perform a handful of dates across the US, Australia, the UK, and Europe through mid-July, including slots at Glastonbury, Down the Rabbit Hole, Way Out West, and more. Find tickets here.

Check out Beth Gibbons’s Coachella setlist below, and head here for more coverage of Coachella 2025. To livestream the final day of Coachella weekend one, head to their YouTube or use the Coachella app.

Setlist:
Tell Me Who You Are Today
Burden of Life
Floating on a Moment
Rewind
For Sale
Lost Changes
Tom the Model (Beth Gibbons & Rustin Man cover)
Beyond the Sun
Glory Box (Portishead song)
Reaching Out

Beth Gibbons y “Glory Box” de Portishead, en vivo en una versión increíble en Coachella 2025.

Lo vi y merecía ser compartido. pic.twitter.com/d9Wp17d0i5

— Patricio Pérez (@YoPatoPerez) April 13, 2025
